DESCRIPTION: in this Screen you will be able to buy music via PayPal API. PayPal API will be used to connect to paypal account. After choosing Artists and Album you will confirm PAYPAL button When push the paypal button and you will go to the PAYPAL screen, After going to the PAYPAL screen,if you have a PAYPAL account,Enter UserName,Password and after your paying the music added to the App
